channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Watch Sabrina Carpenter Perform ‘Hungry Like the Wolf’ With Duran Duran at BST Hyde Park
item.description: 🎶 Sabrina Carpenter joins forces with Duran Duran at BST Hyde Park! 🌟 Watch their epic performance of 'Hungry Like the Wolf' now! 🎤 #SabrinaCarpenter #DuranDuran #BSTHydePark

item.title: Kelly Osbourne & Slipknot’s Sid Wilson Get Engaged at Ozzy’s Final Black Sabbath Show
item.description: Love is in the air! 💍🎶 Kelly Osbourne & Slipknot's Sid Wilson take center stage with an engagement surprise at Ozzy's epic show! ❤️ #RockAndRollRomance

item.title: Rubber Band Gun Announces New Album Record Deal With God: Hear “Thunder Is A Knock”
item.description: Bouncing with excitement for Rubber Band Gun's new album deal with God! 🎸🎉 Listen to "Thunder Is A Knock" now! ⚡ #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Watch The First Clip From Spinal Tap 2: The End Continues
item.description: 🤘 Rock on! Get a sneak peek at the new Spinal Tap 2 - it's going to be epic! 🎸 #SpinalTap2 #RocknRoll

item.title: See Ed Sheeran Perform ‘Teenage Dirtbag’ With Wheatus Singer in Germany
item.description: When Ed Sheeran and Wheatus collab in Germany, magic happens! 🎤🎸 #MusicMashup #CollaborationGoals

item.title: Can We Talk About How Great Steven Tyler Sounded At Black Sabbath’s Farewell Concert?
item.description: 🎤 Steven Tyler absolutely rocked the stage at Black Sabbath's farewell concert! 🤘 Who else is still buzzing from that epic performance? #LegendaryCollab

item.title: Watch Gang Of Four Play Their Farewell Show In Amsterdam
item.description: Farewell rock legends, Gang of Four, went out with a bang in Amsterdam! 🎸🔥 Let's give them a round of applause! 🙌 #RockLegends #GangOfFour

item.title: Ed Sheeran’s ‘Shape of You’ Leads Apple Music’s 500 Most-Streamed Songs of the Decade List
item.description: 🎶 Ed Sheeran's 'Shape of You' reigns supreme on Apple Music's decade-end stream list! 🙌💥 #MusicMilestone

item.title: Ozzy Osbourne Delivers Final Solo Performance at “Back to the Beginning” Concert
item.description: 🎸 Rock legend Ozzy Osbourne goes out with a bang in his final solo show at “Back to the Beginning” concert! 🤘 #OzzyOsbourne #MusicIcon

item.title: Final Black Sabbath Concert Kicks off with Mastodon, Rival Sons, Anthrax, Halestorm, and Lamb of God
item.description: 🎸 Legends unite for an epic finale as Black Sabbath rocks the stage with an all-star lineup! 🤘 #BlackSabbath #MusicLegends

item.title: Oasis Kick Off Reunion Tour in Wales: Setlist and Photos
item.description: 🎸 Oasis is back! 🙌🏼 Follow along as they rock Wales with nostalgia and new energy! 🔥🎶 #OasisReunionTour

item.title: Julian McMahon, Nip/Tuck and Charmed Actor, Dead at 56
item.description: 🎶 Remembering Julian McMahon: a talented actor and music lover who will always have a special place in our hearts ❤️🌟 #RIPJulianMcMahon

item.title: Oasis honour late Liverpool star Diogo Jota with ‘Live Forever’ at first reunion show
item.description: 🎸 Oasis rocking the stage in a heartfelt tribute to Diogo Jota! Legends never die! 🌟 #Oasis #Tribute #RockLegends

item.title: Bad Bunny’s ‘NUEVAYol’ Video Arrives on Fourth of July With Pro-Immigrant Message: ‘Together We Are Stronger’
item.description: 🎉 Bad Bunny dropping new ‘NUEVAYol’ video on July 4th with a powerful pro-immigrant message! 🐰🇵🇷 #BadBunny #NUEVAYol #ImmigrantPride

item.title: Soulwax tease first new album in seven years with London billboard: “ALL SYSTEMS ARE LYING”
item.description: 🚀 Soulwax is back at it with a new album! Are you ready for ALL SYSTEMS ARE LYING? 🔥 #Soulwax #NewMusicComing

item.title: Watch Lana Del Rey & Addison Rae Sing Together At Wembley Stadium
item.description: 🌟 Lana Del Rey and Addison Rae rock the mic at Wembley Stadium! 🎤 Who knew this duo would sound so 🔥 together? #MusicMagic

item.title: Chance the Rapper, Lil Wayne, and Smino Link Up for New Song and Video “Tree”: Watch
item.description: 🔥🎶 Get ready to vibe with Chance the Rapper, Lil Wayne, and Smino in their new music video "Tree"! 🌳 Watch now! #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Charley Crockett Shares Song From New Album Dollar a Day: Listen
item.description: 🎶 Groove into the weekend with @CharleyCrockett's fresh tune from Dollar a Day album! 🎸💥 #NewMusicFriday

item.title: JID Announces New Mixtape Out Tomorrow, Shares “Beau” & “32 (Freestyle)”
item.description: 🎶 Tomorrow just got better! 🚀 Get ready to vibe with @JIDsv's new mixtape dropping soon! Which track are you most excited for? 💥 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Bob Vylan Axed From Radar, Kave Fest After Glastonbury Backlash
item.description: Bob Vylan brings the 🔥, but not everyone's feeling it! 🎸 Who's ready for the next move? #musicnews

item.title: Miley Cyrus Shares Sweet Memory of Father in Reaction to Hollywood Walk of Fame Star
item.description: 🌟 @MileyCyrus warms hearts with touching tribute to dad! ❤️ #FamilyLove #HollywoodStar 🎶

item.title: Black Sabbath Get the LEGO Treatment Ahead of Final Concert
item.description: 🎸 Rock legends Black Sabbath are now immortalized in LEGO form! Who else wants to build their own mini Ozzy Osbourne? 🤘 #LEGOsabbath

item.title: Foreigner Announce December 2025 US Tour with Original Singer Lou Gramm
item.description: 🎸 Ready to rock out with Foreigner in 2025?! The original singer is back! 🎤🤘 #ForeignerTour2025 #LouGrammIsBack

item.title: Foo Fighters Return to Mark 30th Anniversary With New Track ‘Today’s Song’
item.description: 🎸 Rock legends Foo Fighters celebrate 30 years with a killer new track 'Today's Song'! Turn up the volume! 🔥 #FooFighters #NewMusic

item.title: Post Malone Falls Off Stage Mid-Toast During Arizona Show
item.description: 🎤 Cheers to living life on the edge! Post Malone takes stage dives to a whole new level in Arizona! 🍻 #RockstarDown

item.title: Cold Chisel Announce ‘Big Five-0’ Live Album to Celebrate 50-Year Legacy
item.description: 🎸 Rock legends Cold Chisel dropping live album to mark epic 50-year journey! Who's ready to turn up the volume? 🤘 #ColdChisel #LegacyCelebration

item.title: Zach Bryan Shares Three New Songs, Brings Out Fan Who Campaigned To Join Him At BST Hyde Park
item.description: 🎶 New tunes alert! Zach Bryan drops 3 tracks and surprises fan at BST Hyde Park show! 🌟 #MusicNews #FanLove

item.title: Mariah Carey’s Next Album Is Done and Yes, There Will Be Ballads
item.description: 🎤 Mariah's new album is in the oven 👀 Slow jam alert! 🔥 #MariahCarey #NewMusicComing

item.title: Arcadea (Mastodon’s Brann Dailor) Announce New Album, Unveil Single “Fuzzy Planet”: Stream
item.description: 🚀 Get ready to blast off with Arcadea's new album! 🎸🎶 Check out their groovy single "Fuzzy Planet" now! 🔥 #NewMusicAlert #Arcadea

item.title: Jason Aldean Extends Full Throttle Tour to Australia and New Zealand for 2026
item.description: 🌏 Pack your bags, mates! Jason Aldean is taking his Full Throttle Tour down under in 2026! 🎸 #JasonAldean #FullThrottleTour #Australia #NewZealand

item.title: Original Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Movie Returning to Theaters for 35th Anniversary
item.description: 🐢 Turtle power is back! Grab your pizza and shell-ebrate the 35th anniversary of the OG Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles movie in theaters! 🍕🎉 #TurtlePower #TMNT

item.title: How Sabrina Carpenter Raised $1 Million for Charity
item.description: Sabrina Carpenter is not just slaying the music game, she's also a total boss at giving back! 🌟💸 #MusicForACause

item.title: Yo Gabba Gabba! Announce 2025 US Tour Dates
item.description: 🎉 Hold onto your hats, Yo Gabba Gabba! is hitting the road in 2025! 🚌 Which city will you be dancing in? #YoGabbaGabbaTour2025

item.title: Black Sabbath Receive Birmingham’s Highest Honor in Medal Ceremony
item.description: 🤘 Legendary rockers Black Sabbath are now officially Birmingham royalty! 🎸👑 #MetalLegends #RockRoyalty
